mapper.sql: id, credit_serial_num, order_num, sales_main_company, sales_area, sales_country, organization, customer_code, export_pro_name, trade_terms, create_at, order_amount, credit_currency, receive_amount, warn_status, back_response_person, back_date
mapper.select:
SELECT SUM(IFNULL(receive_amount,0)) sd,SUM(IFNULL(order_amount,0)) sdT,IFNULL(SUM(order_amount-receive_amount),0) sded FROM `request_credit`
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT order_amount,receive_amount,(order_amount-receive_amount) AS received,back_date,create_at FROM request_credit
order by ${orderByClause}
SELECT sales_area FROM request_credit GROUP BY sales_area

SELECT DISTINCT sales_country FROM request_credit
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT SUM(order_amount) AS oa,SUM(receive_amount) AS ra,SUM(order_amount-receive_amount) AS received FROM request_credit
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from request_credit
order by ${orderByClause}
